attributes.additional_details: Childrens cancer recovery foundation have been funding financial help for parents with the donations they get. These donations should be going toward's the children who have cancer and need treatment and recovery. I would like it if the government could get involved with this financial help to the parents and fund some money towards it so that the donations can go towards treatment and therapy. The family emergency fund, are there to help with money towards overdue utility bills, council tax, telephone bills, rent or even childcare costs. They also pay towards accomodation nearby the hospital where their child is staying.
